name: Merge Mon
description:
Idle RPG puzzle game - Merge Monster

A simple RPG puzzle game! (similar 2048 games)

Merge your monsters with simple puzzles and create stronger monsters.
Create your own monsters by merging all kinds of monsters!

Make your own monsters and battle against other users!

Reach to the top in ranked league games and get rewards!
Make your monsters stronger with rewards!

Who will be the strongest in the league?
